sources.title: Driven To Kill (Ruslan) | Full Hollywood Movie | Action Crime | Steven Seagal
sources.description:
Driven To Kill - Ruslan is a successful crime writer, his fiction a tribute to his past. He returns to his old neighborhood and discovers that his daughter is marrying the son of his old nemesis, Arban, who is now the leader of the East Coast Russian Mafia. The betrayals and affiliations he discovers must put right in the name of his daughter. The truth of vengeance is Ruslanâ€™s new vocation.
2009.  Stars: Steven Seagal, Mike Dopud, Igor Zhizhikin
*Licensed from Voltage Pictures. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: Based on Russian poet Alexander Pushkin's fairy tale poem of the same name. In the midst of the wedding party of Prince Ruslan and Ludmila, Ludmila is kidnapped by an evil sorcerer. Her father seeks help from his people, but of course Ruslan is the only one able to save her.
metadata.Writer: Alexander Pushkin, Aleksandr Ptushko, Samuil Bolotin
metadata.Actors: Valeri Kozinets, Natalya Petrova, Vladimir Fyodorov
